      public void removePlayer(Integer id)
      Removes player from the game. If game is running waits for the game to end.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the player to be removed.

      public boolean canBegin()
      Checks if the number of players is correct.
      Returns:
      true if correct, false otherwise.

    • newGame

      public void newGame() throws IncorrectNumbersOfPlayersException, NotEnoughCreditException
      Sets up new game. Resets all the values like folded, bidden, currentBids, etc.
      Throws:
      IncorrectNumbersOfPlayersException - See IncorrectNumbersOfPlayersException
      NotEnoughCreditException - See NotEnoughCreditException

      Method handles discarding and drawing cards.
      Parameters:
      playerId - Player that want to draw a card.
      cardsToDiscard - ArrayList of indices of the cards that player wants to discard.
      Throws:
      IncorrectNumberOfCardsException - See IncorrectNumberOfCardsException

    • bid

      public void bid(int playerId, int bidValue) throws NotEnoughCreditException, TooSmallBidException
      Method handles bidding performed by player.
      Parameters:
      playerId - ID of the player that wants to bid.
      bidValue - Value of credits that player wants to bid.
      Throws:
      NotEnoughCreditException - See NotEnoughCreditException
      TooSmallBidException - See TooSmallBidException

    • howMuchToBid

      public int howMuchToBid(int playerId)
      Returns how much credits player needs to bid to even up the current stake.
      Parameters:
      playerId - ID of the player that want to perform this action.
      Returns:
      credits value.
